sentences.en: France has been the holdout in trying to negotiate an end to the dispute.
sentences.cn: 法国在解决这次争端的谈判中拒不让步。

sentences.en: In contrast to Samsung, Apple is a holdout.
sentences.cn: 与三星相比，苹果没有屈服。

sentences.en: It is hard to see how the deadlock with holdout creditors can be broken.
sentences.cn: 很难预见与债权人“钉子户”形成的僵局如何打破。
